name: Legion of Super Heroes: Chemical King Quiz | Entertainment | 10 Questions

questions.text: Like Shadow Lass, Chemical King first appears on the cover of 'Adventure Comics' #354 (1967), over a year before he's introduced in an actual story.   Why?
questions.correct: He's shown as a statue honoring dead Legionnaires
options: He's shown as a member of another team of heroes
He was included by artist error
He was one of many "reader suggested" heroes
questions.explanation:
He's shown as a statue honoring dead Legionnaires.

	In an "Adult Legion" tale set in the Legion's future, Superman visits the Legion and encounters the Hall of Monuments honoring Legionnaires who died in battle.  Chemical King is represented by one of the statues.

questions.text: In 'Adventure Comics' #371 (1968) readers are introduced to Chemical King when he is recruited by the Legion to go under cover for them.  Where does the Legion find Chemical King?
questions.correct: He was a member of the Legion Academy
options: He was the member of another super hero team
They met him during an open application for Legion membership
They put a bulletin outside their club house
questions.explanation:
He was a member of the Legion Academy.

	Chemical King and Timber Wolf are both members of the Legion Academy, training for Legion membership.  They both go under cover for the Legion and are both extended full membership when the case is concluded.

questions.text: What is Chemical King's home planet?
questions.explanation:
Phlon.

	Phlon is a colony world known for its abundance of valuable and rare minerals.

questions.text: What is Chemical King's real name?
questions.explanation:
Condo Arlik.

	Jim Shooter, Chemical King's creator, envisioned him as being from a very wealthy family and being highly liked by others.

questions.text: How did Chemical King get his powers of speeding and slowing chemical reactions?
questions.correct: He is a mutant who was born with them
options: He was subjected to experimentation by Evillo
His mother went through the tail of a comet when she was pregnant
He volunteered to be given a meta-boost when registering for the draft
questions.explanation:
He is a mutant who was born with them.

	Condo was born to two non-meta parents and his powers were discovered when he was still an infant when the walls of the hospital began rusting around him.

questions.text: Because of his powers, Chemical King spent most of his early life in isolation.  Eventually, a future Legion member created a serum to help Chemical King control his powers, and became an extremely close friend with him. Which future Legionnaire was it?
questions.explanation:
Invisible Kid.

	Lyle Norg (the future Invisible Kid) was a biochemist who took an interest in Chemical King's condition.  After helping him gain better control of his powers, Lyle showed Condo many of the things he'd missed growing up.  Lyle eventually talks Condo into joining the Legion Academy as Chemical King.

questions.text: For many years, Chemical King is a minor player in Legion adventures.  His power set not being fully understood by some writers.  Which fellow Legionnaire were his powers often confused with?
questions.explanation:
Element Lad.

	Chemical King would sometimes be portrayed "creating" chemicals, rather than being a catalyst for their reactions.

questions.text: Chemical King dies a hero in 'Superboy' #228 (1977).  He sacrifices his life for what reason?
questions.correct: To prevent Deregon from starting World War VII
options: Saving a child from a monster
To stop Computo from continuing its destruction
Saving millions from a planetary implosion
questions.explanation:
To prevent Deregon from starting World War VII.

	As foretold 10 years earlier when a statue of him was seen in the Hall of Fallen Heroes, Chemical King prevents the outbreak of World War VII, by absorbing a deadly amount of poisonous radiation.

questions.text: In the Post Zero Hour/Reboot Legion continuity, the character of Chemical King does not appear to have any powers, nor does he join the Legion.  What profession does he have?
questions.explanation:
He is a reporter.

	In this continuity he goes solely by his real name.  Condo Arlik is a reporter, and in this continuity he is portrayed with darker skin rather than the Caucasian color from the Legion's original continuity.

questions.text: In the "RetroBoot"/New 52 continuity, the Legion admits a member named Chemical Kid who shares the same powers that Chemical King had.  What relationship does Chemical Kid have with the deceased Chemical King?
questions.explanation:
There is no biological relationship.

	Chemical Kid's wealthy father used Chemical King's deceased body to synthesize Condo's chemical reaction powers, then used his son as a human guinea pig.
